5/8

Address: 121 E Liberty St, Ann Arbor, MI 48104

summary.snippet: "Friendly staff and yummy vegan cinnamon rolls and cookies."
"I am in love with the people, food and sweet vibe at this place."
"Why would you flavor plain frosting like that when you dont even use butter?"

most_relevant.description: If you’re craving giant, one-of-a-kind cinnamon buns, this is the place to go! They offer a wide range of options, from ultra-sweet to classic plain buns. What really sets them apart is the use of FRESH fruit, which adds a delicious balance. As someone with a major sweet tooth, I usually love chocolate, but the fresh fruit perfectly complements the sweetness of the cinnamon. I highly recommend trying the Lemon Tart Roll, Very Berry Roll, and Raspberry Dream Roll. Although it might not be on the menu, it’s worth asking about seasonal flavors like the Pumpkin Cheesecake Roll. There are only two tables inside, so don’t plan on dining in but I’ve managed to sit down each time. Lastly, the staff is always friendly and welcoming!

Amazing!!! Absolutely delicious, definitely a go to dessert place, and im not even vegan! I couldn’t decide what I wanted and so one of the workers, Yonah, was super sweet and switched out one of the soft serve flavors for me (pineapple with the strawberry float) and it was so good! Ordering it again next time im there for sure.

OH ABSOLUTELY YESSSS. PLEASE GO HERE. These are the best cinnamon rolls I’ve ever had…. AND EVERYTHING IS VEGAN??? Like I was in awe. You would never know, and I’m saying this as someone who gave her dairy-eating brother a cinnamon roll from here, and he thought it was delicious. Divine!

Gotta try Cinnaholic when in Ann Arbor-

Came in for a cinnamon roll and a loaf of coffee cake and loved every bit of it. The staff working the store also saw that I was in grad regalia and handed me out a free cookie. Great folks, would highly recommend a visit!
This place is awesome. Great cinnamon rolls, great cookies, and cookie dough. They have awesome gluten-free options too! My biggest request is some tea, they have some great coffee, but no tea.

As Korean, I don't understand American food culture enough, and I have no idea what cinnamon roll supposed be. Therefore my review has relatively less credibility compared to that from someone who knows more about this category. I liked the texture of the roll and the well balanced cinnamon taste, but everything else was too sweat for me. I loved the first and maybe the second bite but could not really finish the whole. This does not necessarily mean their cinnamon rolls are wrong. They were just different from what I'm used to. But definitely worth trying!

Love this place! Best place to find vegan cinnamon rolls. I had never tried cinnamon rolls due to dietary restrictions but this place also made me experience vegan marshmallows in one of the rolls I ordered. The servers are nice and prepare the order very quickly.

I’ve been coming here for a few years, I’ve left a review  (5 stars) on yelp 7 months ago, but wanted to reach more people, I LOVE THIS PLACE!! When taking the bus to work i always stopped in for a triple shot coffee every morning, the perfect push to get me through a shift. I’ve tried all of their floats, they have PINEAPPLE DOLE WHIP (the stuff from Disney world) and make incredible floats, that are perfect for nice weather, or just a tasty treat (they have great heating), onto their baked goods, you can taste the effort that goes into making every product perfect. Every cinnamon rolls i try is incredible, my favorites are the new seasonal apple fritter roll, a seasonal but not currently out,  peach cobbler roll, and anything with peanut butter on it. I recently had a seasonal peanut butter cookie, it absolutely blew me away, i tried to make my own version at home and came up short, so i will be returning shortly to buy them out. Their snickerdoodle cookies are incredible, don’t usually enjoy snickerdoodle cookies, but Cinnaholic’s are the best I’ve ever had. The atmosphere is enjoyable, and relaxed, the customer service is always incredible, and the owner always greets me with a smile when i see him. Such a amazing place, i refuse to go anywhere else for cinnamon rolls. Even if I’m out of town.
